page.title: 17Interview _ S.Molton police
page.content: This is an interview with P.C.Goodman. Has there ever been a murder in South Molton?{No. What has been South Molton most famous crime ?{The most famous incident and {the one that used the most police time {was the beast of Exmoor. This was an {animal that killed sheep in the area. {Many people thought that it was a {large cat, maybe a puma. It was never {found.} How many policmen are there in South Molton?{8 constables and 1 sergeant.} How many policemen were there 20 years ago ? {4 constables. } How many special constables are there in South Molton ?{7 special {constables.} When are they used ?{At the annual {carnival, fetes and at the Horse Show.
